answers.answer: I would suggest not smoking cannibus (weed). If it isn't helping you, why smoke it? Please don't get me wrong, I am a firm believer in the medicinal value of weed, but if you aren't able to tolerate the effects, then stay away from it, please.  You also may have smoked weed that was sprayed with a pesticide. You are so young...unless you have chronic pain or cancer, don't smoke weed. Its obviously not helping you.  And...yes...I am a mother of 2 young adults in their 20's. :)Good luck dear.

Please just stop smoking it... even the Un-Weed is dangerous... in fact, the new FAKE weed is mainly chemicals and is worse for you than the regular.../ if you are not PRESCRIBED medical marijuana you should not be using it anyhow.

HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!As I understand, you gave up smoking cannabis about 2 years back.If you still have vision disturbances, then consult an eye specialist. Vision disturbances can be due to glaucoma, refractive errors (near or far sightedness), diabetes, retinal detachment, optic stroke, infection or injury to eye, migraines, floaters, brain tumors, temporal arteritis or due to bleeding into the eye. It is unlikely to be due to cannabis after so long.Do discuss this with your doctor and get yourself examined. Take care!

question: After   smoking cannabis   i  start  to feel  very  bad,the   first  symptoms  was   the   feeling  like  can  my  peripheral vision  are not  static()  ,the  thinking  about  it  causes   a serios  depresion , dificulty in : learn new information,listening  somebody and analize  what he  says. I went to the neurologist ,he  gave me treatment  but  it  didn't  work . Two years have passed since  it  happened and the  symptoms  that persist now  is disturbed vision .My   question  is  ,can   it  be something  like vertigo ,and  what  i  must  to do ?Any help will be greatly appreciated
title: After use of Cannabis
